description:
[ENGLISH ONLY] Are you a business traveler who hates to deal with expense receipts while on the road? Wouldn't it be nice to have a way to easily record your expenses on-the-go so you will have an organized summary when you get back to the office? Or maybe have your trip expense summary emailed to your office assistant who can file your expense reimbursement report for you?

jExpense is a Palm WebOS app which can do all of this and more! With jExpense, you can easily enter and store your expenses on your Palm Pre/Pixi smartphone as you accumulate them while on a trip. You can also have jExpense 'Remember' previously entered vendors, cities, etc. so they can easily be selected the next time you create a similar expense. Multiple trips can be created to allow you to track expenses from more than one trip.

jExpense can also generate a summary report for a trip and automatically create an email with the report embedded in the email's body. This allows you to easily email your trip summary to yourself or to someone else directly from your Palm smartphone!
 
Main Features:

Easy to use interface.
Ability to create multiple trips for expense tracking.
User-defined category labels, as well as vendors and city labels.
Search/filter feature.
Email report summary.
Backup and restore database via email.
Displayed expense items are sorted by date (ascending or descending order).
Mileage expenses are entered as distance and reimbursement rate.
User-defined field names.
